home.title: Krishi Kavach
home.subtitle: Crop Disease Detection
home.description: Advanced agricultural platform for farmers to detect crop diseases, get weather forecasts, and receive expert advisories.

weather.title: Farm Weather Information
weather.subtitle: Current weather conditions and 7-day forecast for your farm
weather.fetching: Fetching weather data for your farm location...
weather.failed: Failed to fetch weather data. Please ensure your profile has a valid farm location.
weather.noData: No weather data available. Please ensure your profile has a valid farm location.

register.title: Create Your Account
register.idProofRequired: ID proof is required for agronomist registration.
register.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in
register.mobileLength: Mobile number must be exactly 10 digits
register.mobileFormat: Must start with 6, 7, 8, or 9 and be 10 digits

unauthorized.heading: Unauthorized Access
unauthorized.message: You don't have permission to access this page.

advisory.title: Weather-Based Crop Advisory
advisory.noLocation: Location not found. Please update your profile with district and coordinates.
advisory.locationError: Failed to fetch location. Please try again.
advisory.weatherError: Failed to fetch weather data. Please try again later.
advisory.noData: No weather data available. Please ensure your profile has a valid location.
advisory.highTemp: High temperature alert! Protect crops from heat stress. Provide shade and increase irrigation.
advisory.frostAlert: Frost alert! Cover sensitive crops and protect from freezing temperatures.
advisory.wateringNeeded: Watering recommended. Low rainfall and high evapotranspiration detected.
advisory.excessRain: Heavy rainfall expected. Ensure proper drainage to prevent waterlogging.
advisory.lowSoilMoisture: Low soil moisture detected. Increase irrigation frequency.
advisory.highSoilMoisture: High soil moisture. Reduce irrigation to prevent waterlogging.
advisory.diseaseAlert: High disease risk! High humidity and rainfall increase fungal disease risk. Apply preventive fungicides.
advisory.highWind: High wind alert! Secure crops and structures. Wind speed may damage plants.
advisory.uvAlert: High UV index! Protect crops from excessive sunlight. Consider shade nets.
advisory.fertilizerGood: Good conditions for fertilizer application. Moderate temperature and rainfall.
advisory.allGood: All conditions favorable for crop growth.

diseaseDetection.noDiseasesDetected: No diseases detected in the image.
diseaseDetection.errorDetecting: Error detecting diseases. Please try again.
diseaseDetection.noPreviousTests: No previous tests found. Start detecting diseases to see your history here.
diseaseDetection.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this report?
diseaseDetection.analyzingImage: Please wait while we analyze your image
diseaseDetection.welcomeMessage: Welcome! Disease detection is available for the following crops. Select your crop:

error.imageTooLarge: Image size should be less than 10MB
